Summary: 4-5 redish-pink glowing objects hoovering over Dayton during fireworks.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy young child and I were leaving the Moraine Ohio fireworks displays around 10:25p.m. I drove down Dryden Rd. until I reached Nicholas Rd to turn left. The traffic light was red so we stopped. I told my child to look out her window we were on the small bridge and we can see people's fireworks. We saw a few fireworks going off when I noticed five balls of light that did not fade. I turned left when my traffic light turned green. I turned left and pulled off the road to the right on Nicholas Rd. The balls of reddish-pink light were still there. I watched the lights for several minutes. One off the objects kept moving back and forth between the other objects. Finally 3 of the objects took off and flew over to the right a short ways and then flew straight up and disappeared in the sky in like 2-3 seconds. At that time I got back in my car and drove home in excitement and called my friends and family to see if anyone else has seen what I had seen.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Dayton
There were no other sightings in Dayton on or around July 4th 2013
